Job Description: Software   Development Engineer 2 (NodeJs/Java) (14536) - Bangalore       A typical SDE1 is expected to take up the   following responsibilities:     Be a hands-on engineer and build well designed and high-quality   product     Review design documentation and code written by other engineers.     Be part of the lateral hiring process     Should strive for following best coding/ software practices throughout the   process of designing, development, and testing.  Skills:     Deep understanding of algorithms and data structures     Proficiency in one of the languages like NodeJS, Java, Python, Ruby,   etc     Experience in object-oriented programming     Experience in working with fairly complex database schemas (structured or   unstructured databases)     Should have worked with MVC frameworks, web/client-server .Qualification  - BE
